title: Font on CD Cover
author: mauriz

comments.content: It looks like **[Dumaigne](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112337/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=T-26&ffam=Dumaigne%20-%20Regular&fid=1ee2b998d8a0240de8be353226aa4ef4&fsize=60&text=Aureliano&fit=1)** by Jim Marcus [1996, T-26] but I can't find it in T26's or any other legitimate font site
Thank you very much! It seems difficult to find it, but at least I know now \*what\* I'm searching for! Thanks again! Max
